name: df-wunc
body: |- wceq(cwunm, cmpt(s0, universe, cint(crab(s1, cwun, wss(cv(s0), cv(s1))))))

comment: A function that maps a set ` x ` to the smallest weak universe that contains the elements of the set. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 2-Jan-2017.)
